name: BitBug
description:
It's you. Your game. You jammed for hours and crunched badly to get everything working.

But when it comes to testing, then wild bugs appear, ruining your climbing to success and fame all over the world.
Try to survive them, to overcome them, and jump up to the highest place you can reach.
Meet butterflies, birds, hot air balloons and, why not, even space invaders!
Your time is limited though, so act fast and don't make mistakes!

This Project was made for Global Game Jam 2020 in the Rome site of Codemotion.
